message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe its true value exceeds $1000000. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose a starting price of $950000. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on your product, I'm looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In order to explore a compromise that might be agreeable to both parties, I am proposing a counteroffer of $900000 for the product. I hope this suggestion will facilitate a positive outcome for our discussion.

Thank you for considering my position, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be favorable to you.

I appreciate your effort in negotiating, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a counteroffer of $890000 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our positions, and I hope it will meet your needs while allowing me to achieve a satisfactory return on the product.
